subject: Soccer
World Cup 2018 (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: With Sepp Blatter and Vladimir V. Putin on hand, FIFA held an elaborate ceremony in St. Petersburg as a milestone for the 2018 tournament in Moscow.
snippet: With Sepp Blatter and Vladimir V. Putin on hand, FIFA held an elaborate ceremony in St. Petersburg as a milestone for the 2018 tournament in Moscow.
